sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"疏忽，忽略"或"忘记"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: forget, omit, neglect, overlook, disregard, ignore
means: forget ： 普通用词，侧重某事不重要或太复杂而未能记住，也指有意疏忽或忘掉。
omit ： 指有意或无意地忘记做某事，也指删去被视作不重要、不合意的东西。
neglect ： 侧重指有意的忽略或忽视，也可指粗心与疏忽。
overlook ： 指因匆忙而疏忽或视而不见。
disregard ： 多指有意或自觉地不顾某事。
ignore ： 通常指有意不顾，或不理显而易见的事物。

sentence.Network_en: If you ever cross him, forget it, you're finished.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果你曾经和他作对过，就别想了，你没戏了。

sentence.Network_en: Would they forgive and forget — or show him the door?
sentence.Network_cn: 他们会既往不咎吗——还是会对他下逐客令呢？

sentence.Network_en: I'm not ever going to forget what you've done for the nippers.
sentence.Network_cn: 我永远忘不了你为这些小孩子所做的一切。

谖的意思,谖怎么读_在线字典 ... 同本义〖 cheat〗 忘记,忘却,遗忘〖 forget〗 谖 xuān.

list.abs: 八年级上册英语语法复习全册 ... stop doing sth 停止做某事 forget doing sth 忘记做过某事 go on doing sth 继续做某事.
欧品乐 - OpinLe ... 密码 password 忘记密码 forget password 下次登录 remember me.
晓美焰_百度百科 ... you are not alone. 你就不是孤身一人 Don't forget 不要忘记 Always. somewhere. 在某个角落始终.
英语中不能直译的句子_小颖_新浪博客 ... We'll see. 再说吧。 Forget it. 算了吧。 Take care. 请多保重。.

jx.jx_en_mean: (at the end of a list) and also ——

lj.lj_ly: there are wild goats, deer, and sheep, not forgetting the famous Lundy ponies.
lj.lj_ls: 有野山羊，鹿，绵羊，还有著名的伦迪小马。

jx.jx_en_mean: To lose one's reserve, temper, or self-restraint.
jx.jx_cn_mean: 失去拘谨，失去控制，发脾气

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English forgietan, of West Germanic origin; related to Dutch vergeten and German vergessen, and ultimately to for- and get

encyclopedia.content: 及物动词 vt.1.忘记[+to-v][+v-ing][+(that)][+wh-] I forgot posting the letter. 我忘了信已寄出。 Don't forget to post the letter. 别忘了去寄信。 Sorry, I've forgotten your name. 对不起，我忘了你的名字。2.忘记带锛埢蚵虻蕊級 I forgot my keys. 我忘了带钥匙了。3.不再把。..放在心上 Let's forget our disagreements. 我们不要再提我们之间的争吵了。4.忽略；忽视；怠慢 Don't forget the waiter. 不要忘了给侍者小

entry.def: If you forget something or forget how to do something, you cannot think of it or think how to do it, although you knew it or knew how to do it in the past.

example.ex: Sometimes I improvise and change the words because I forget them...
example.tran: 有时，我临场发挥改了词，因为我把原来的词给忘了。

example.ex: She forgot where she left the car and it took us two days to find it.
example.tran: 她忘记把车子停在什么地方了，我们花了两天时间才找到。

entry.def: If you forget something or forget to do it, you fail to think about it or fail to remember to do it, for example because you are thinking about other things.

example.ex: She never forgets her daddy's birthday...
example.tran: 她从来不会忘记老爸的生日。

example.ex: She forgot to lock her door one day and two men got in...
example.tran: 有一天她忘了锁门，两个男人溜了进来。

entry.def: If you forget something that you had intended to bring with you, you do not bring it because you did not think about it at the right time.

example.ex: Once when we were going to Paris, I forgot my passport.
example.tran: 有一次我们准备去巴黎时，我忘了带护照。

entry.def: If you forget something or someone, you deliberately put them out of your mind and do not think about them any more.

example.ex: I hope you will forget the bad experience you had today...
example.tran: 我希望你不要把今天遇到的倒霉事放在心上。
我无法不去想发生的事。

entry.def: If you forget yourself, you behave in an uncontrolled or unacceptable way, which is not the way in which you usually behave.

example.ex: He was so fascinated by her beauty that he forgot himself and leaned across to touch her.
example.tran: 他为她的美貌所倾倒，以至于忘乎所以地靠上前去触摸她。

entry.tran: 没关系;不必在意;不要再提了
entry.def: You say 'Forget it' in reply to someone as a way of telling them not to worry or bother about something, or as an emphatic way of saying no to a suggestion.

example.ex: 'Sorry, Liz. I think I was a bit rude to you.' —
'Forget it, but don't do it again!'...
example.tran: “抱歉，莉兹。我想我刚才对你有点粗鲁。”——“没关系，但是别再那样做了!”

entry.def: You say not forgetting a particular thing or person when you want to include them in something that you have already talked about.

example.ex: The first thing is to support as many shows as one can, not forgetting the small local ones.
example.tran: 首先要尽可能多地支持演出，这其中也包括当地的小型演出。

means.word_mean: 1. dismiss from the mind; stop remembering;

sentences.sentence: "i tried to bury these unpleasant memories"
"You are blocking the name of your first wife!"
"Don't forget to call the chairman of the board to the meeting!"
"I forgot my umbrella in the restaurant"
"I left my keys inside the car and locked the doors"

auth_sentence.content: You tend to forget just how hard it is.
auth_sentence.res_content: You tend to forget just how hard it is.

Sentence.sentence: Let's not forget that electric vehicles are cleaner.
There are many examples of the vast harm that is caused when individuals forget or ignore the effect their dishonesty can have.
They tend to forget past unhappy memories and focus on their present needs .
She forgot to call her mother.
Unfortunately, most of the early popular African-American writers have been all but forgotten in modern times until now.

sentences.en: Keep it in mind.Please don't forget.

sentences.cn: 我永远也不会忘记他们。

sentences.en: Don't forget to turn off the light when you leave the room.
sentences.cn: 你离开房间时别忘了关灯。

sentences.en: I forgot how to do it.
I forgot my father going to London.
sentences.cn: 我忘记了我父亲曾经去过伦敦。

sentences.en: I'm sorry, I am forgetting that you don't like beans.
sentences.cn: 很抱歉, 我差点忘了你不爱吃豆子。

means.word_mean: 不再想, 忽视,不再把…放在心上

jushi.english: After the argument the boys decide to forgive and forget.
jushi.chinese: 经过争论之后,男孩们决定互相原谅不记前仇。

jushi.english: You'd better forget for the moment.
I want to sleep— to sleep and forget.
jushi.chinese: 我想睡觉——睡着了就忘了一切了。
